title: my game keeps breaking
body: my league app on mac OS keeps not opening and i have to keep deleting it and installing it, now it wont open at all if you could fix this that would be great

replies.body: Sorry to hear you've had so much trouble getting the patcher up, but I can help!  This usually happens if your network is unable to reach our patching service, so it won't launch.  The steps in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide should help fix this up as well as any issues that might have occurred after logging in.
